buttons.hairAnalysis: SCHEDULE YOUR FREE HAIR ANALYSIS & CONSULTATION NOW

noResults.title: No results found
noResults.description: Please try a different search or select another category.

moreQuestions.title: Still have questions?
moreQuestions.description: We understand that a hair transplantation is an important decision. Our team of experts is happy to answer all your questions in a personal and non-binding consultation.

beforeAfter.sliderAriaLabel: Slider to compare before and after images
beforeAfter.convincedText: Schedule your free consultation now and find out how we can help you achieve fuller hair. Our experts will analyze your individual situation and develop a customized treatment plan.

benefits.personalConsultationText: Discover how we can help you regain your confidence. In a personal consultation, we analyze your individual situation and develop a customized treatment plan for hair, beard, or eyebrows.

testimonials.nextSuccessStoryText: Join our satisfied patients and experience for yourself how a hair transplant can change your life. Schedule your free consultation now and get advice from our experts.
